 Army, an international movement, is an evangelical part of the 
universal Christian Church. Its message is based on the Bible. Its 
ministry is motivated by the love of God. Its mission is to preach the gospel of Jesus Christ and to meet human needs in His name without discrimination.  We provide food assistance to all eligible individuals and families.  Photo ID is preferred, but never required.  We also offer various other types of assistance: rental assistance, utility assistance, case management programs, children's educational programming, and more!    Please call us or stop by our office if you are in need of food assistance or would like more information regarding our programs and services. ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "Case Management Program -
